Get ready for the biggest update EVER:

PARKOUR CRYSTALS!
Tired of having to start all over when falling into lava just 10 feet before the finish? Respawn at the last Crystal you reached instead!

NEW NEXUS!
Yes, Nexus finally got an awesome update, filled with fun activities and hidden secrets!

VIP-WORLD!
If you're a VIP-member, you can enter the amazing VIP-World, where you can party in the dance club and even FLY!

NEW CRAZY BLOCKS!
Conveyor-belts, glass-blocks, ladder-blocks, and much more!

MORE VIP-TOOLS!
Want to add FOG to your World? Flip BlockStars? You got it!

Introducing: GADGETS!

Gadgets are fun, weird, impressive, or silly items and effects that you can use in Nexus, Chat, and sometimes in other modes as well! Eat a birthday cake, activate low gravity, or ...start farting!?

Here's an extra tip: When you use a Gadget, you earn XP!

We just put a brand-new collection of blocks in the shops: The Green Package! It's full of brand-new and exclusive blocks, such as grass, tulips, water lilies, mushrooms, and much more!

Enjoy making winter a little bit greener ^^

MAJOR CHANGES IN 3.15:

TIME FOR A SWIM!
We have added WATER to the game! Add it to your World with the new Water-tool, raise or lower its level, and change its color! Happy swimming!

SMOOTH SLOPES!
Running up and down sloped surfaces now feels much smoother (check out the conveyor-belt i Nexus, for example)

OTHER CHANGES
- Cyrillic, Greek, and Hebrew characters are no longer supported in the game, in order to ensure a safe chat experience.

TRAINING WORLDS!
Yes, now you can practice your Parkour- and Battle skills in our new special Worlds, guided by Rita Blasta!
But beware of Duckie...

NEW QUESTS!
We completely changed our quests, so now both Dex, Rita, Blockbjorn, and Penny have all-new, all-awesome quests for you!

SELFIE FILTERS!
You read that right - you can now add filters to your Selfies!

- Added price-tags to Gadgets

NEW LEVEL-UP EXPERIENCE!
You will now unlock new items and features at every new level - as well as free gifts! Time to earn XP!

OTHER CHANGES
- We now remember your most recent searches, so you easily can find the things you need
- You can now preview all items on your current BlockStar in the shops

SEASON 1: TRAVEL TO THE BLOCKTEK EMPIRE!
In BlockStarPlanet's first-ever Season, Dex, Rita, Ziggi, and the gang travel through a mysterious portal and end up in the seat of the mighty Blocktek Empire!

Join the fierce PANTHER TRIBE!

Explore the TEMPLE CITY NEXUS!

Discover the SECRET of the Blocktek!

Enter the Temple of DOOM... if you DARE!

And don't forget to check out the amazing new COLLECTIONS and BLOCKS!

SEASON 2: SHOW YOUR ALLEGIANCE!
In BlockStarPlanet's Second Season, we have travelled to the mystical Cherry Blossom Garden, but peace has splintered: The BlockStars have split into two clans!

Choose between Rita's and Blockbjorn's rival CLANS!

Explore and play in the CHERRY BLOSSOM GARDEN!

Join the mighty ranks of the SHOGUN SAMURAI!

Challenge your survival on the breakneck cliff walls of MOUNT KIKEN!

Invite your friends and immerse yourself in Japan with the amazing new COLLECTIONS and craft away with the new BLOCKS!

SEASON 3: COLOR EXPLOSION!
In BlockStarPlanet's third Season, we have ascended through the skies to arrive in a crazy, colorful RAINBOW WORLD!

Explore the fantastical, colorful world of CHROMASIA!

Meet its jolly ruler KING KAWAII!

Witness the adorable and cute might of the KITTY POWER!

Descend into pure darkness and meet the scary Dwellers in the UNDERGROUND!

Unravel the mystery of the missing color in all-new QUESTS to play!

SEASON 4: STARPORT NEXIA!
In BlockStarPlanet's fourth Season, a distress call has taken us to an epic SPACE STATION!

Learn the fate of Ziggi's dad: DR. STARBLOCK!

Play the part of an intergalactic explorer into the FINAL FRONTIER!

Descend into the over-the-top craft craziness of Dr. Starblock's EXPERILAB!

Compete with a rival team in a series of all-new STORY QUESTS!

SEASON 6: PARKOUR CITY!
In BlockStarPlanet's sixth Season, it's all about the #1 game mode!

- Get rewarded for your skills with all-season DOUBLE PARKOUR XP!

- Join the ranks of the incredible PARKOUR PROs!

- Scale the unforgiving heights of an under-construction SKYSCRAPER!

- Craft unique World Specials using KINETIC CRYSTALS!

SEASON 7: HOWLING WOODS!
In BlockStarPlanet's seventh season, we all go camping in the woods!

- Explore the cosy campsite and the enchanted FOREST!

- Ride butterflies and become the star of your own FAIRY TALES!

- Shrink down to fairy-size and visit the mysterious FAIRY KINGDOM!

- Solve the mystery of a missing person in all-new QUESTS!

- Craft spooky rewards during the epic HALLOWEEN-EVENT!
